recipesJson.name: Fix my transmission
recipesJson.author: Crazyhorse
recipesJson.description: This is a shake & vape. I really needed something to go with some corona the beer. It pairs up nice with a beer and some warm weather. Iâ€™d say sweeten to taste. I got the idea from Superbloke and his line of juice. It came out good. After a week or two the strawberry starts to fade and the watermelon pops out more.
